Articles.Content: How can I find and read variables like the speed of the craft, the altitude

Hi and welcome to the forum!

Information about the active vessel will be in FlightGlobals.ActiveVessel, which has many properties dealing with velocity and position.

  • https://kerbalspaceprogram.com/api/class_flight_globals.html
  • https://kerbalspaceprogram.com/api/class_vessel.html
